String Note name
content
String Note content in markdown format
description (optional)
String Description of note purpose or context

NoteInput Up

Input schema for creating or updating Note
name
String Note name
content
String Note content in markdown format
description (optional)
String Description of note purpose or context

NoteListItem Up

Summary information for Note in list responses
name
String Note name
description (optional)
String Description of note purpose or context
metadata (optional)
array[Metadata] Key-value pairs for additional note metadata
id
UUID Unique identifier for the note format: uuid
created_at (optional)
Date Creation timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
modified_at (optional)
Date Last modification timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time

OAuthProtectedResourceMetadata Up

OAuth 2.0 protected resource metadata as defined in RFC 9728
resource
String The protected resource's resource identifier URL format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080
scopes_supported (optional)
array[String] JSON array of OAuth scope values supported by this protected resource
example: ["openid","email","profile"]
authorization_servers (optional)
array[String] List of authorization server issuer identifiers that can issue tokens for this resource format: uri
example: ["http://localhost:8080"]
jwks_url (optional)
String URL of the protected resource's JSON Web Key Set format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/.well-known/jwks.json
bearer_methods_supported (optional)
array[String] Supported token presentation methods for bearer tokens
example: ["header","body","query"]
resource_name (optional)
String Human-readable name of the protected resource
example: TMI (Threat Modeling Improved) API
resource_documentation (optional)
String URL with information for developers on how to use this protected resource format: uri
example: https://github.com/ericfitz/tmi
tls_client_certificate_bound_access_tokens (optional)
Boolean Whether the protected resource supports TLS client certificate bound access tokens
example: false

Participant Up

A participant in a collaboration session
user
User
last_activity
Date Last activity timestamp format: date-time
permissions
String Access permissions in the collaboration session
Enum:
reader
writer

Point Up

A 2D point with x and y coordinates
x
BigDecimal X coordinate
y
BigDecimal Y coordinate

PortConfiguration Up

Port configuration for node connections
groups (optional)
map[String, PortConfiguration_groups] Port group definitions
items (optional)
array[PortConfiguration_items] Individual port instances

PortConfiguration_groups Up

position (optional)
String Port position on the node
Enum:
top
right
bottom
left

PortConfiguration_items Up

id
String Unique port identifier
group
String Port group this port belongs to

Complete Repository schema with server-generated fields

UUID Unique identifier for the repository format: uuid
metadata (optional)
array[Metadata] Optional metadata key-value pairs
created_at (optional)
Date Creation timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
modified_at (optional)
Date Last modification timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
name (optional)
String Name for the source code reference
description (optional)
String Description of the referenced source code
type (optional)
String Source code repository type
Enum:
git
svn
mercurial
other
parameters (optional)
RepositoryBase_parameters
uri
String URL to retrieve the referenced source code format: uri

Base fields for Repository (user-writable only)

String Name for the source code reference

String Description of the referenced source code

String Source code repository type
Enum:
git
svn
mercurial
other
parameters (optional)
RepositoryBase_parameters
uri
String URL to retrieve the referenced source code format: uri

repo-specific parameters for retrieving the source
refType
String Reference type (branch, tag, or commit)
Enum:
branch
tag
commit
refValue
String Reference value (branch name, tag value, or commit id)
subPath (optional)
String Sub-path within the repository

TMListItem Up

Enhanced item for threat model list endpoints with key metadata and counts
id
UUID Unique identifier of the threat model (UUID) format: uuid
name
String Name of the threat model
description (optional)
String Description of the threat model
created_at
Date Creation timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
modified_at
Date Last modification timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
owner
String Email address of the current owner
created_by
String Email address, name or identifier of the creator
threat_model_framework
String The framework used for this threat model
document_count
Integer Number of documents associated with this threat model
repo_count
Integer Number of source code repository entries associated with this threat model
diagram_count
Integer Number of diagrams associated with this threat model
threat_count
Integer Number of threats defined in this threat model
issue_uri (optional)
String URL to an issue in an issue tracking system format: uri
asset_count
Integer Number of assets associated with this threat model
note_count
Integer Number of notes associated with this threat model

Threat Up

id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier for the threat (UUID) format: uuid
threat_model_id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier of the parent threat model (UUID) format: uuid
created_at (optional)
Date Creation timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
modified_at (optional)
Date Last modification timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
name
String Name of the threat
description (optional)
String Description of the threat and risk to the organization
mitigation (optional)
String Recommended or planned mitigation(s) for the threat
diagram_id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier of the associated diagram (if applicable) (UUID) format: uuid
cell_id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier of the associated cell (if applicable) (UUID) format: uuid
severity
String Severity level of the threat
Enum:
Unknown
None
Low
Medium
High
Critical
score (optional)
BigDecimal Numeric score representing the risk or impact of the threat
priority
String Priority level for addressing the threat
mitigated
Boolean Whether the threat has been mitigated
status
String Current status of the threat
threat_type
String Type or category of the threat
metadata (optional)
array[Metadata] Key-value pairs for additional threat metadata
issue_uri (optional)
String URL to an issue in an issue tracking system for this threat format: uri
asset_id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier of the associated asset (if applicable) (UUID) format: uuid

ThreatModel Up

id (optional)
UUID Unique identifier for the threat model (UUID) format: uuid
created_at (optional)
Date Creation timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
modified_at (optional)
Date Last modification timestamp (RFC3339) format: date-time
created_by (optional)
String User name, email or identifier of the creator of the threat model
documents (optional)
array[Document] List of documents related to the threat model
repositories (optional)
array[Repository] List of source code repositories related to the threat model
diagrams (optional)
array[Diagram] List of diagram objects associated with this threat model
threats (optional)
array[Threat] List of threats within the threat model
notes (optional)
array[Note] List of notes associated with the threat model
assets (optional)
array[ExtendedAsset] List of assets associated with the threat model
status_updated (optional)
Date Timestamp when the status field was last modified (RFC3339). Automatically updated by the server when status changes. format: date-time
name
String Name of the threat model
description (optional)
String Description of the threat model
owner
String Email address of the current owner
threat_model_framework
String The framework used for this threat model
authorization
array[Authorization] List of users and their roles for this threat model
metadata (optional)
array[Metadata] Key-value pairs for additional threat model metadata
issue_uri (optional)
String URL to an issue in an issue tracking system for this threat model format: uri
status (optional)
array[String] Status of the threat model in the organization's threat modeling or SDLC process. Examples: &quot;Not started&quot;, &quot;In progress&quot;, &quot;Review&quot;, &quot;Approved&quot;, &quot;Closed&quot;

String The framework used for this threat model
authorization
array[Authorization] List of users and their roles for this threat model
metadata (optional)
array[Metadata] Key-value pairs for additional threat model metadata
issue_uri (optional)
String URL to an issue in an issue tracking system for this threat model format: uri
status (optional)
array[String] Status of the threat model in the organization's threat modeling or SDLC process. Examples: &quot;Not started&quot;, &quot;In progress&quot;, &quot;Review&quot;, &quot;Approved&quot;, &quot;Closed&quot;

User Up

Represents a user in the system
user_id
String OAuth provider's unique identifier for the user (from primary provider)
email
String User's email address
name
String User's display name
picture (optional)
String URL to user's profile picture
idp (optional)
String Identity provider used for current session
groups (optional)
array[String] Groups the user belongs to (from identity provider)
last_login (optional)
Date Timestamp of user's last login format: date-time

inline_response_200 Up

issuer
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080
authorization_endpoint
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/authorize
token_endpoint
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/token
userinfo_endpoint (optional)
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/userinfo
jwks_uri
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/.well-known/jwks.json
response_types_supported
array[String]
example: ["code","token","id_token","code token","code id_token","token id_token","code token id_token"]
subject_types_supported
array[String]
example: ["public"]
id_token_signing_alg_values_supported
array[String]
example: ["HS256"]
scopes_supported (optional)
array[String]
example: ["openid","email","profile"]
claims_supported (optional)
array[String]
example: ["sub","email","email_verified","name","given_name","family_name","picture","locale"]
introspection_endpoint (optional)
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/introspect

inline_response_200_1 Up

issuer
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080
authorization_endpoint
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/authorize
token_endpoint
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/token
introspection_endpoint (optional)
String format: uri
example: http://localhost:8080/oauth2/introspect
response_types_supported
array[String]
example: ["code","token","id_token"]
grant_types_supported (optional)
array[String]
example: ["authorization_code","implicit","refresh_token"]
token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported (optional)
array[String]
example: ["client_secret_post","none"]

keys
array[inline_response_200_2_keys]

inline_response_200_2_keys Up

kty
String
example: oct
use
String
example: sig
alg
String
example: HS256
kid
String
example: tmi-signing-key

inline_response_200_3 Up

active
Boolean Whether the token is active/valid
example: true
sub (optional)
String Subject (user identifier)
example: user@example.com
email (optional)
String User email address
example: user@example.com
email_verified (optional)
Boolean Whether the email is verified
example: true
name (optional)
String User's full name
example: John Doe
exp (optional)
Integer Token expiration time (Unix timestamp)
example: 1640995200
iat (optional)
Integer Token issued at time (Unix timestamp)
example: 1640991600
iss (optional)
String Token issuer
example: http://localhost:8080

inline_response_200_4 Up

providers
array[inline_response_200_4_providers]

inline_response_200_4_providers Up

id
String Provider identifier
name
String Display name of the provider
icon
String Icon identifier for the provider
auth_url
String TMI authorization endpoint URL for this provider format: uri
token_url
String TMI token exchange endpoint URL for this provider format: uri
redirect_uri
String OAuth callback URI configured for this provider format: uri
client_id
String OAuth client ID for this provider

String Identity provider ID

array[inline_response_200_5_groups]

String Group name
display_name (optional)
String Display name for the group
used_in_authorizations (optional)
Boolean Whether this group is used in any threat model authorizations

is_primary (optional)

inline_response_409 Up

error
String Error message indicating session already exists

value
String New value for the metadata entry

value
String New value for the metadata entry

String New value for the metadata entry

value
String New value for the metadata entry

value
String Metadata value

metadata_key_body_5 Up

value
String New value for the metadata entry

oauth2_introspect_body Up

token
String The JWT token to introspect
example: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...
token_type_hint (optional)
String Optional hint about the type of token being introspected
example: access_token

oauth2_refresh_body Up

refresh_token
String Valid refresh token
example: 8xLOxBtZp8_example_refresh_token

oauth2_token_body Up

code
String Authorization code received from OAuth provider
example: 4/0AX4XfWiXY2BZ_example_auth_code_from_google
state (optional)
String State parameter for CSRF protection (optional but recommended)
example: random_state_value_abc123
redirect_uri
String Redirect URI used in the authorization request (must match exactly) format: uri
example: https://your-web-app.com/oauth2/callback

saml_acs_body Up

SAMLResponse
String Base64-encoded SAML response
RelayState (optional)
String State parameter for CSRF protection

saml_slo_body Up

SAMLRequest
String Base64-encoded SAML logout request

op
String Patch operation type
Enum:
add
replace
remove
move
copy
test
path
String JSON path to target
value (optional)
Value to apply

array[threat_modelsthreat_model_idthreatsbulk_patches]

op
String
Enum:
add

value (optional)
